Control Name: 2.17.1 The application was built natively for the cloud.
Control Statement: While cloud-native workloads are preferred, migrated or modernized applications are reality and they might not utilize the available cloud functionality like auto-scaling, platform notifications and other features the underlying cloud platform can offer. Understanding if the application is cloud-native or not provides a very useful high level indication about potential technical debt for operability and cost efficiency.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.17 What operational excellence allowances for cost have you made?
